title: [Buried Tressures, Office]
description: Desiccated strips of scalp, with locks of hair still attached, hang on small hooks descending from the ceiling.  Some pillows of patchwork leather in varied tones lay scattered about the floor of broken and brittle oak boards.  A makeshift stand supports a gracefully posed, mummified carcass, with one hand pinned against its hip and the other glued against its cheek.  The sickeningly sweet smell of decay lingers in the air.
